forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a canvas of mostly sunny skies, inviting residents and visitors alike to revel in the warmth. With temperatures that will gently embrace the mid-seventies, the afternoon promises a slight coolness as the day transitions towards evening. A gentle northwest breeze dances through the streets, softening the air and creating a refreshing atmosphere perfect for outdoor pursuits. As the sun begins its descent, the city looks vibrant and inviting, free from the fog that often blankets this iconic landscape.

Tonight, the coolness will enhance the charm of the evening, dropping to a comfortable low of around 54 degrees. A few clouds will gently edge into the sky, but they will not obscure the stars that might emerge. For those venturing out, an ensemble of light layers is advised—a light jacket may be just the ticket to ensure comfort during twilight strolls or relaxed dinners al fresco. You might find joy in wandering through local cafes or enjoying a serene walk along the waterfront, letting the calm ambiance wash over you as day transforms into night.
